# Invisibility Purge (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 302

You surround yourself with a sphere of power with a radius of 5 feet per caster level that negates all forms of *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]]*.

Anything invisible becomes visible while in the area.
